description.value: The tournament combatant attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] a target. On a success, the demoralized creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the end of their next turn. The tournament combatant gets a +2 circumstance bonus to their damage against a creature made off-guard in this way.
